name: cs-ubuntu-docker-tailscale
postCreateCommand: echo 'net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.d/99-tailscale.conf && echo 'net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding = 1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.d/99-tailscale.conf && sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/99-tailscale.conf && sudo tailscale up --auth-key=$TS_AUTHKEY --advertise-exit-node
